name: British Airways Boeing 747-400 Negus Retro Livery Delivery: BACK TO THE 80S!
description:
I was very lucky to be invited to welcome the final British Airways Boeing 747-400 to be painted in a retro livery - G-CIVB which wears the British Airways Negus retro livery from the early 1980s!
